abstract: This week’s opening of the Study comes at a particularly gloomy time for the hotel industry, but the privileged status of the Yale campus may offer a degree of stability.
snippet: This week’s opening of the Study comes at a particularly gloomy time for the hotel industry, but the privileged status of the Yale campus may offer a degree of stability.
lead_paragraph: NEW HAVEN  The economy was collapsing around him, but Paul T. McGowan barely took notice last week as he prepared for the opening of his company’s first wholly owned hotel: the Study at Yale.

headline.main: A Themed Hotel Comes to an Ivy League Town
headline.print_headline: A Themed Hotel Comes To an Ivy League Town
